water_qa_text.text:
('Water UI NEXT Q&A
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For normal player: 

Q: Why can not I use Item Quick Move though I switch on the toggle?
A: Please switch to Classic UI instead of Pocket UI [Settings -> Video -> UI Profile -> Classic] and reboot Minecraft.

Q: What is the function of the arrow which is on the right side of Pause Screen?
A: You can switch between Pause Buttons and Player List by pressing it.

Q: Many songs are playing at the same time. It is so annoying!
A: Please turn them off one by one.

Q: What is the function of the trash bin on Container/Inventory Screen?
A: That is the button which enables you to throw the item(s) at a faster speed.

Q: How can I open the Inventory Screen?
A: Please press the button beside Hotbar.

Q: Why is there no sound on Music Box?
A: Please activate the Sound Patch provided by kkkzheli.

Q: How to add extra songs into Minecraft?
A: Please activate the Patch provided by kkkzheli and modify it following the indications.

Q: FPS < 10 after activating Water UI NEXT?
A: If your device is not good enough, please switch off some functions by modifying the file _global_variables.json.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For developer: 

Q: Can I steal the code?
A: No, You must not do that!

Q: Can I spread the pack?
A: Of course you can. It is completely free of charge.

Q: How to modify the customized functions?
A: I have left some comments in the pack, you will find them after unzipping the pack.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Debug area: 

§b[Global] Font Type: §a'+$font_type+'§b[HUD] Welcome Window: '+$welcome+'§b[HUD] Paper Doll: '+$doll+'§b[HUD] Hotbar Bottom Black: '+$hotbar+'§b[HUD] Key Display: '+$key_display+'§b[HUD] Compass & Clock & Item & Operation: '+$hud_info+'§b[Brewing Stand] Potion Recipe: '+$potion_list+'§b[Furnace/Smoker/Blast Furnace] Furnace Recipe: '+$furnace_list+'§b[Container] Bottom Blue: '+$container_bottom_blue+'§b[Container] Small Icon: '+$container_icon+'§b[Container] Paper Doll: '+$container_paper_doll+'§b[Container] Heart & Hunger Info Display: '+$container_info+'§b[HUD] Clock: '+$clock+'§b[Progress] Loading Style: '+$loading+'§b[Start & Pause & Container] Snow: '+$snow+'§b[Screenshot & Sign] Gradual Blur Background: '+$gradual_blur_background+'§b[Global] Debug Mode: '+$debug)
